text: Lore Hoffmann (born 25 July 1996) is a Swiss middle-distance runner who specialises in the 800 metres. She finished fourth at the 2019 Summer Universiade. ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2017 |European U23 Championships |Bydgoszcz, Poland |5th |800 m |2:05.65 |- |2018 |European Championships |Berlin, Germany |7th (sf) |800 m |2:01.67 |- |rowspan=2|2019 |Universiade |Naples, Italy |4th |800 m |2:02.58 |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |26th (h) |800 m |2:03.40 |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *400 metres – 54.14 (Geneva 2018) *800 metres – 1:58.50 (Bellinzona 2020) *1500 metres – 4:23.76 (Langenthal 2017) *400 metres hurdles – 1:00.35 (Aarau 2018) Indoor *400 metres – 55.45 (Magglingen 2018) *800 metres – 2:05.48 (Metz 2019) *1000 metres – 3:05.26 (Magglingen 2014) ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss female middle- distance runners Category:Competitors at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Lore Hoffmann
